name: Reconciliation (Tidal_Maze)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Have you ever wondered [What is reconciliation?]

Have you ever wondered [Why are we called to reconcile with others?]

Have you ever wondered [What does it take to reconcile?] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game, you will explore these questions with Austin as he learns about reconciliation from both the worldly view and the biblical view in a snowy Christmas evening.

By the end of the game, I hope both you and Austin would be able to find the answers to the questions above.

Game play: 10 ~ 15 minutes

Controls: [space bar] for text to show, [left click] to interact with objects
